content_scripts.__css_comment: These are injected in the order they appear in this array, before any DOM is constructed or displayed for the page.
content_scripts.__js_comment: In the case of 'document_end', the files are injected immediately after the DOM is complete, but before subresources like images and frames have loaded. In the case of 'document_start', the files are injected after any files from css, but before any other DOM is constructed or any other script is run.
